alert.note: Alert for Parmer (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 6:44PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Parmer County through 715 PM CDT... At 643 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Oklahoma Lane, or 14 miles north of Muleshoe, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects and vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lazbuddie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
